name: Hoy!?!
description:
Everyone is stuck inside, but there is still so much to be delivered. Time to pack up your stuff and help bring as many giftpacks as you can to the proper destination. But be careful, have too much parcels, and you might start dropping them everywhere. Good luck and have fun! Controls

WD keys to move left and right

S to drop down platforms

Space to Jump

Goal

Pick up the gifts, bring to the matching arrow. Play for the highest score. (Mine's 2000)

Submission for Quarantine Jam.

All comments will be greatly appreciated :)
